column8: Tea is appreciated in many cultures of the world, has been around for centuries and is the second most consumed beverage in the world after water! I appreciate tea as it is a neccessity to kick-start my day and it is over a cup of tea that I create ideas, chat to family and friends and problem solve! Tea bags are more than bags of leaves they are bags of sense helping to reduce heart disease, strokes, diabetes and the creation of new ideas and designs!
column21: A t-shirt celebrating the humble cup of tea, from weadmire.net
